DOC.detailed_description: The subject group interview twice receive three questionnaire . One two week prior schedule cesarean section schedule obstetric outpatient visit , first interview questionnaire administer couple . A second questionnaire provide still hospitalize ( 5 day post partum ) , mother partner . Six week post partum , schedule obstetric outpatient visit , couple interview last time ask complete third last questionnaire .
